text: aur hava ko sulemaan ka (taabeidaar bana diya tha) ki usakee subah kee raphtaar ek maheene (musaafat) kee thee aur isee tarah usakee shaam kee raphtaar ek maheene (ke musaaphat) kee thee aur hamane unake lie taambe (ko pighalaakar) usaka chashma jaaree kar diya tha aur jinnaat (ko unaka taabedaar kar diya tha ki un) mein kuchh log unake paravaradigaar ke hukm se unake saamane kaam kaaj karate the aur unamen se jisane hamaare hukm se inaharaaf kiya hai use ham (qayaamat mein) jahannum ke azaab ka maza chakhaanege
